title: How to reduce the amount of my data online - Quora

response.answer_text: Several ways - but mainly shutting things off when you’re not using them. Mail clients, social media and other apps are very chatty and will keep using data in background. If you’re using a desktop, when you aren’t actually using it, disable the ethernet adapter. If it’s a mobile, turn off cellular data. Stream videos at a lower resolution. Don’t leave torrent clients running Do automatic backups less frequently Mainly, be aware of what you have running that uses data.
